description: This LED Backlit keyboard is the most innovative idea for anyone with extensive computer use. No more eye stress, the Clear and sharp contrasted non-glare LED lighted keys relieve the common strain on your eyes. This is the best solution for using your computer in dim or dark places. No more keeping the lights on when others want to sleep, keyboard lets you type away while others sleep peacefully. With numerous additional convenient and comfort features, this is a must have for everyone with a computer.General Features:* Anti-Static, Anti-electromagnetic interference* Comprehensive multi-media keys to master the voice and image* Easy to browse the Web with One-touch Internet access* Whole silica gel smooth touch quiet tap cushioned keys* Clear and sharp non-glare LED lighted letter board* Low power energy saving technology* Key life of more than 10,000,000 percussions* Backlight On/Off button switch* USB interface connection* Compatible with all Windows PC Desktop Computer and Mainframe Terminals* Hot Keys Include: Email; Home Page; My Web Favorites; Internet Search; Play/Pause; Volume Up; Volume Down (Mute)* Dimensions: 6 3/8"L x 15 7/8"W x 1"H
title: Ivation for Life LED Backlit Letter Illuminated Multimedia Computer Keyboard DB-3203B
